definition: to lend/to borrow/by means of/to take (an opportunity)
to record/to note/to memorize/to remember/mark/sign/classifier for blows, kicks, shots

sentences.english: We pay all our bills by direct debit.
sentences.chinese: 我們以直接借記方式支付所有賬單。
考慮預付費的銀行借記卡。

sentences.english: Therefore, the estimated cost of this coal is debited to the Inventory account.
sentences.chinese: 因此煤的預計成本借記到存貨賬戶。

sentences.english: Visa already dominates the U.S. debit-card market.
sentences.chinese: 維薩已經壟斷了美國的借記卡市場。

sentences.english: I will go over the missing of credit biked or cancel which biked.
sentences.chinese: 我要辦理借記卡掛失並停止那張卡。

sentences.english: I like to regedit the loss of the credit biked or cancel it.
sentences.chinese: 我要辦理借記卡掛失並停止那張卡。

sentences.english: Debit cards do not possess the overdrawing function.
sentences.chinese: 借記卡不具備透支功能。

sentences.english: I like to report the loss of credit biked or cancle it .
sentences.chinese: 我要辦理借記卡掛失並停止那張卡。

sentences.english: Debit cards and online banking are used more widely than credit cards in some countries.
sentences.chinese: 在某些國家，借記卡和網上銀行也比信用卡更普及。

sentences.english: Due to her credit biked debts, his wife is in the cat-apatment.
sentences.chinese: 由於欠借記卡的債，他老婆有麻煩。

sentences.english: Can I offer by check or credit biked?
sentences.chinese: 我能用支票或借記卡嗎？

sentences.english: The act of recording a debit in an account is called debiting an account.
sentences.chinese: 在賬戶上記錄一個借項的行爲叫做借記帳戶。

sentences.english: If any charges are to be made they are debited either quarterly or half-yearly.
sentences.chinese: 如果收取費用，這些費用按季度或半年借記賬戶。

sentences.english: The debit portion of the entry allocates this expired COST to expense.
sentences.chinese: 分錄的借記方將已使用了的成本部分分配到費用賬戶。

sentences.english: I like to apply to a visa or cancel which biked.
sentences.chinese: 我要辦理借記卡掛失並停止那張卡。

sentences.english: ROUND UP: Get cash back from your debit card at store checkouts.
sentences.chinese: 從商店結賬處你的借記卡上拿回現金。
